name: WeGather
overview:
WeGather helps faith communities and schools connect privately online to facilitate the volunteer participation that is so vital to their success.

Our mission is to enable churches and schools to build and manage well connected communities through the power of cutting edge web-based software technology. We offer any church or school a private web portal with the most robust and the most FREE tools in one place: calendars, event invites, document storage, email blasts, photos, and more! It’s flexible to meet the needs of any size organization, from an 8-person social committee to a 3,000+ member congregation.

WeShare, our fee-based donation management system, integrates seamlessly with WeGather. WeShare is the segmentâ€™s only fully-certified PCI compliant system and boasts superior speed, usability, security, and flexibility.

Like us on Facebook or go to WeGather.com for details.

milestones.description: WeShare reaches first $1 Million in donations, in just 9 months.
